trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for Web Parts controls that under certain conditions must replace other Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Web 部件控件，在某些情况下必须替换页面上的其他 Web 部件控件的基类。

trans-unit.source: ProxyWebPart is the base class for a set of Web Parts controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>, that can be used as placeholders for other Web Parts controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPart 是一组 Web 部件控件的基类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>，可用以占位符形式的页面上的其他 Web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a ProxyWebPart control will replace another Web Parts control when some type of error or failure has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，ProxyWebPart 控件将某种类型的错误或故障发生时替换另一个 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a user is not authorized to view a Web Parts control on a page, the intended Web Parts control is replaced with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当用户无权查看页上的 Web 部件控件，则的目标 Web 部件控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.UnauthorizedWebPart>

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts control cannot be loaded or a new instance of it cannot be created, the original Web Parts control is replaced with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法加载 Web 部件控件或不能创建它的新实例，将替换原始的 Web 部件控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the intended Web Parts control later becomes available to the user, it will be restored to the page and the object derived from the ProxyWebPart class will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 部件控件更高版本的预期变得可供用户，将还原到页，并且将删除从 ProxyWebPart 类派生的对象。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPart class does not save view state or control state.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPart 类不保存视图状态，也不控制状态。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts control is replaced by a ProxyWebPart object and then later becomes available, its view state and control state will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 部件控件替换为 ProxyWebPart 对象，并将更高版本变为可用，则其视图状态和控件状态将为空。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPart object preserves personalization data for the Web Parts control that it replaced.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPart 对象保留它替换为 Web 部件控件的个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, its personalization data will be restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始的 Web 部件控件变为可用，将还原其个性化数据。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control saves personalization data, it does not save the properties of a ProxyWebPart object.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件保存个性化数据，它不会保存 ProxyWebPart 对象的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it saves the properties of the control that the ProxyWebPart object replaced.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它将保存 ProxyWebPart 对象替换为控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control will automatically load it.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始的 Web 部件控件变为可用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件将自动加载它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection> object contains the ProxyWebPart object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>对象包含 ProxyWebPart 对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the intended Web Parts control can be retrieved from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以从检索 Web 部件控件的预期的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>属性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.GenericWebPartID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.OriginalID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a ProxyWebPart object replaces a Web Parts control that is either the provider or consumer of a Web Parts connection, the connection is not activated but will not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPart 对象将替换的 Web 部件控件的提供程序或 Web 部件连接中使用者时，如果连接未激活，但将不会删除。

trans-unit.source: If the original Web Parts control becomes available, the connection will be reactivated.
trans-unit.target: 如果原始的 Web 部件控件变为可用，则连接将重新激活。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> class when a static Web Parts control (or server or user control) must be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref>时静态 Web 部件控件 （或服务器或用户控件） 的类必须将其替换。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a static Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于创建替换静态的 Web 部件控件的代理 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: To replace a dynamically created Web Parts control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 若要替换动态创建的 Web 部件控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>构造函数来创建代理 Web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 要替换的 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> class when a dynamic Web Parts control must be replaced.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref>时动态 Web 部件控件的类必须将其替换。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used to create a proxy Web Parts control to replace a dynamic Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数用于创建替换动态 Web 部件控件的代理 Web 部件控件。

trans-unit.source: To replace a static Web Parts control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29> constructor to create a proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 若要替换静态的 Web 部件控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>构造函数来创建一个代理 Web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%29>

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the control to replace.
trans-unit.target: 是的控件 ID (不是唯一的 ID) 的控件替换的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is replaced, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件被替换，该 ID 是子服务器控件的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <xref:System.Type> of the control to replace.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，它的名称<xref:System.Type>要替换的控件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is replaced, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控件被替换，类型名称是其子服务器控件的类型。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the user control to replace.
trans-unit.target: 包含要替换的用户控件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control, if that type of control is being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 返回的 ID 字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref>控制，如果该类型的控件将被替换。

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: 这不是继承自的控件的必需<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>基类。

trans-unit.source: originalPath is specified but genericWebPartID is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: originalPath指定但genericWebPartID是或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*> property from the generic Web Parts control replaced by a proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>从泛型替换由一个代理服务器的 Web 部件控件的属性 Web 部件控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control, this property contains the value from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件，此属性包含的值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programmatic identifier assigned to the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置分配给 Web 部件控件的编程标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object will contain the same value in its ID property as the control it replaced.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象将包含它替换为该控件在其 ID 属性相同的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含标识符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*> to prevent loading previously saved state for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*>以防止加载以前保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to prevent loading the control state.
trans-unit.target: LoadControlState 方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>以防止加载的控件状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadControlState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method does not load the control state or perform any other action.
trans-unit.target: 该方法不会加载的控件状态或执行任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*> to prevent loading previously saved view state for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*>以防止加载以前保存的视图状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to prevent loading the view state.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>以避免在加载视图状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method does not load the view state or perform any other action.
trans-unit.target: 方法不加载视图状态或执行任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>Web 部件控件的 Web 部件控件替换为代理。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a Web Parts control, the OriginalID property contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the replaced control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象将替换 Web 部件控件、 OriginalID 属性包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>的被替换的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the replaced control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object, this property contains the ID from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 被替换的控件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>对象，此属性包含来自 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart.ChildControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> value of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>Web 部件控件的值替换为 Web 部件控件的代理。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the user control being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在替换的用户控件的路径。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control being replaced.
trans-unit.target: 包含要替换的用户控件的路径的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the Web Parts control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>Web 部件控件的 Web 部件控件替换为代理。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> object replaces a control, this property contains the <xref:System.Type> of the control that the proxy Web Parts control replaces.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>对象替换控件时，此属性包含<xref:System.Type>代理 Web 部件控件替换的控件。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the <xref:System.Type> of the control replaced by the proxy Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含<xref:System.Type>替换由代理的控件的 Web 部件控件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Saves any server control state changes that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 将所有服务器控件都保存自页回发到服务器的时间以来发生的状态更改。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有与控件关联的状态，则此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any state that was modified after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*> method was invoked.
trans-unit.target: 将保存已修改后的任何状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>调用方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.TrackViewState*>

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current view state of the control; otherwise, if there is no view state associated with the control, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件; 的当前视图状态的对象否则为如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
